# Data transformation

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plyr)
confirmed <- read.csv("data/time_series_covid19_confirmed_global.csv")
recovered <- read.csv("data/time_series_covid19_recovered_global.csv")
deaths <- read.csv("data/time_series_covid19_deaths_global.csv")
confirmed2 <- confirmed %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = !c(Province.State, Country.Region, Lat, Long), names_to = "Dates", values_to = "Confirmed")
recovered2 <- recovered %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = !c(Province.State, Country.Region, Lat, Long), names_to = "Dates", values_to = "Recovered")
deaths2 <- deaths %>% 
  pivot_longer(cols = !c(Province.State, Country.Region, Lat, Long), names_to = "Dates", values_to = "Deaths")
df <- join(confirmed2, recovered2)
df <- join(df, deaths2)
```
